entry.title: Terra Founder Faces Government Investigations, Lawsuits, and $78M Fine for Tax Evasion
entry.summary: South Korean authorities have formed an emergency financial crimes unit to investigate the collapse of stablecoin protocol Terra, and fined the protocol’s founder, Do Kwon, $78M for tax evasion, local media reported. The government agencies want to understand why UST, Terra’s US dollar stablecoin, lost its peg on May 9. entry.title: Crypto Markets Stabilize After $693B Sell-Off
entry.summary: Crypto markets have stabilized, ending a market free-fall that erased $693B from crypto’s market capitalization from May 5 to May 12.
